CheckCertificateChain.document: 对证书链完整性进行检查
CheckCertificateChain.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: ssl.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CheckCertificateChain
<公共请求参数>

{"CertificateChain":"-----BEGIN CERTIFICATE-----MIIFrDCCBJSgAwIBA.................BJSgAwIBA-----END CERTIFICATE-----\n-----BEGIN CERTIFICATE-----MIIErjCCA5agAwIB.................DCCBJSg-----END CERTIFICATE-----"}
CheckCertificateChain.title: 对证书链进行检查
